com.rift.coad.daemon.desktop
Interface DesktopManager

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface DesktopManager
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface provides a means to manage all the desktops used by a user.

Method Summary
 void addDesktop(java.lang.String name)
          This method adds the specified desktop to the list of available desktops.
 DesktopInfo getDesktopInfo(java.lang.String name)
          This method returns the information for a specified desktop.
 java.util.List<MimeType> listDesktopApplications(java.lang.String desktop)
          This method returns a list of the desktop applications.
 java.util.List<DesktopInfo> listDesktops()
          This method lists the desktops in place for a user.
 void removeDesktop(java.lang.String name)
          This method removes the specified desktop from the list.
 void renameDesktop(java.lang.String oldName, java.lang.String newName)
          This method renames a desktop.
